name: The Fool
interpretations: The Fool stands at the edge of a cliff, overlooking a vast landscape, embodying the spirit of new beginnings, innocence, and an adventurous leap into the unknown. The excitement fills him with optimism and a readiness to embrace the future. Fear not, for the journey beckons. Take the first step, and let spontaneity guide your feet. Let the wind at your back and the stars above guide you forward, for every stride will be a teacher, every triumph and setback an opportunity to grow. Believe in yourself, and let instinct be your compass. Take that leap of faith, and let destiny unfold before your eyes.

name: The Magician
interpretations: The Magician reigns supreme, a master of all elements. His wand an extension of his will, his cup brimming with magic, his sword sharp and swift, his pentacle a symbol of his power. With each tool, he weaves his will, surmounting obstacles with ease and achieving his heart's desire.You too, hold the power to manifest, to shape and shift the world around you. Within you lies the strength to overcome any obstacle, the brilliance to innovate and the readiness to face any challenge. Trust in your abilities, for you are a force of nature, capable of creating wonders beyond imagination.

name: The High Priestess
interpretations: The High Priestess guards a sacred Torah, her knowledge veiled from the common gaze. Seated before the glow of the full moon, she is joined by her familiars - a black cat and a white cat - purring in ethereal harmony. The veil, adorned with pomegranates, wraps them in a cloak of enchantment. Beyond this realm of the conscious, lie the elusive depths of the subconscious shadows. Let your intuition guide you exposing secrets and truths that lie within your situation. Embrace the spiritual and the mystical, for only then can you wield the power of your psyche.

name: The Empress
interpretations: Her aura pulses with the vitality of fertility, passion, and initiative. She cradles the universe, the mother of all, with her gentle and intuitive touch. The Empress is the absolute embodiment of unbridled feminine grace and might. Bask in the beauty of life, and trust your instincts. Let your imagination soar, and your soul sparkle with the awe-inspiring force of creation. Embrace this pulse of life, for it is the harbinger of new beginnings, of fresh and fertile perspectives, and a trove of creativity that knows no bounds.

name: The Emperor
interpretations: With his ironclad will and raw power, the Emperor commands the forces of the universe, unyielding in his quest for control. He wields aggression as a weapon and operates with a single-minded focus, never swayed by remorse or hesitation. Let the fires of masculinity, aggression, and control stoke your passions, and propel you forward towards your goals. This is your moment of dominance, a time to seize the reins of power and assert your will. Though your passion may at times stir anger or frustration, harness it creatively and forge ahead with determination. For you too, like the Emperor, are a force to be reckoned with.

name: The Hierophant
interpretations: Amidst the tapestries of spiritual lore, The Hierophant emerges as a guide to the faithful, a beacon of wisdom and devotion. The Hierophant requires subordination and discipline from his followers. Be aware of someone imposing servitude and captivity upon your free soul. The window dressings of religious institutions can be beautiful, but they are rarely reflective of what is happening behind closed doors. Mercy, Goodness, Grace and Inspiration can be present here. Open your mind and your heart, think for yourself, and be good to others.

name: The Lovers
interpretations: The Lovers appear before you, lost in each others' eyes with only the Moon to witness their bond. You should be aware of attraction to another, and even love, growing between you. So, be mindful of the path you tread, and let your heart guide you towards a love that is both true and enduring. It is enough to overcome trials if you both choose to love. Love is a choice, not a chance.

name: The Chariot
interpretations: As the Chariot charges forth, obstacles crumble before it, and challenges yield to its might. The Chariot is the embodiment of unbridled power, surging with the force to overcome any hurdle in its way. You will make progress. Do not back down. Keep moving forward. You have graduated from walking. Now you can achieve your goals faster and with really cool cats. Do the thing. Seek triumph.

name: Strength
interpretations: There is a secret to Strength. Here's a hint: It's about Love. Love is the ultimate Strength. Do not let the shadows of doubt sway you from your path. You are filled with Power and Energy. You are capable of so much more now. Love is an Amazing Force of Nature. Be courageous. Be magnanimous. Be Strong. Go Forth and Love! Seek the glory that awaits you.

name: The Hermit
interpretations: The Hermit lives alone in quiet solitude. The earth supplies his every need. With no worldly desires, he embodies simplicity, a beacon of resistance against the tide of conformity and societal decay. You should take some time to yourself. Stay away from the clamor of crowds or unnecessary social situations. Embrace moments of wandering, free from the shackles of external expectations, and seek enlightenment from within. Let the stillness of your heart guide you towards the answers you seek.

name: Wheel of Fortune
interpretations: The Wheel of Fortune appears whenever you are about to experience a change in your luck for the better. It signals a shift in the winds of fate, a chance to spin the wheel and uncover treasures untold. While you may not win the lottery, not taking the risk ensures an empty hand. Luck and Felicity are on your side when the Wheel of Fortune is in your hand, for when the wheel beckons, the universe conspires to light your path with serendipity and joy. Let go of negativity, and try new things. Who knows what destiny awaits when the Wheel of Fortune is in your grasp?

name: Justice
interpretations: Justice sees with the eyes of the simple Hermit in touch with all the inner truths of the world. Justice has Divine Power of righteousness. This is a time for following the laws of nature, integrity, and love. What has been stolen from you will be dealt with along with any other transgressions, including your own. In all your dealings, let fairness reign supreme, and above all, let the light of love and respect guide your path.

name: The Hanged Man
interpretations: His expression is one of awe and revelation as he views a serene yet profound moment against a mystical landscape that blurs the boundaries between the physical and spiritual realms. But his new perspective will prove absolutely necessary for all that will follow in his life. You may be given the circumstance and opportunity for a new perspective. It may take you out of your comfort zone but accept the challenge. The rest of your life will be completely different ... In a good way.

name: Death
interpretations: Amidst the shadows of life, lurks a transformative force - Death. Riding on a dark steed, it brings closure to patterns that no longer serve. It dispels addictions, false beliefs, and other things that need to change. While this does not imply that someone will die, it does imply that some way of life does need to change or end all together. There is a destructive energy in play. Try to cooperate with it. Fighting this energy will be useless.

name: Temperance
interpretations: A beautiful angel pours chalices of light and water. In its essence, Temperance urges us to weave harmony amidst opposites that seem at odds. Pay attention to the imbalances of your life. Moderate your behavior and your emotions. Try to create synergy between the opposites that seem to create conflict. Look within and heed the warning signs of imbalance, for it is in the reconciliation of extremes that true synergy emerges bringing forth a life that is both radiant and serene.

name: The Devil
interpretations: In the shadows of our souls, the Devil lurks. The Devil is menacing, controlling, painful energy. He is no distinguisher between the man or the woman. He is a puppeteer, a boss, a jerk. The Devil's grasp may be fierce, but we hold the power to break free from his grip. Everyone is free to leave him, but we must leave our addictions as well. Let go of addictions in your life. Work to be free of anyone's menacing control. Put down the heavy chains and walk away. There is so much more to this life. Ask for help. Accept help.

name: The Tower
interpretations: In a blinding flash of light, the Tower succumbs to the wrath of the heavens and crumbles into the earth. Nothing is left of this structure. The Tower suffers complete annihilation. Something you have built in your life is about to be completely destroyed. You will definitely survive. Those you love will survive. But all that you hold as truth, all that you have erected, be it relationships or beliefs, is vulnerable to sudden upheaval. Take shelter for now. Clean up later.

name: The Star
interpretations: The Star depicts a young person completely focused on a beautiful star reflected in a pool of water. Innocence radiates from this moment, promising a bright future or the sting of disillusionment. While it is always wonderful to find beauty in the world, the message here is about gullibility and focus. It reminds us to balance our dreams with grounded preparation and protection. For in the realm of magic, a wary heart can shield against the snares of deceit and heartache.

name: The Moon
interpretations: The Moon shines out through the darkness upon the wild wolf and the domesticated dog. It is up to you to make your decision while no one can see you in the dark. Will you choose the path of the wild wolf: free, ruthless, and selfish? Will you choose the path of the domesticated dog: loyal, obedient, and selfless? Be aware of the energies pulling you to walk on the wild side. Are you making safe decisions? Be aware of the energies pushing you to walk in obedience. Your life is meant to be lived boldly.

name: The Sun
interpretations: Like a radiant beacon of positivity, the Sun's energy shines forth, illuminating every corner of your being. Its vivacious warmth surrounds you, imbuing you with a sense of childlike wonder and joy. You feel like you are meant to be at this place, in this time, for this very moment. You are happy and calm. The Sun speaks to your identity and to your very soul. The warmth, the surge, the advantage you need is with you. Embrace the Sun's radiance and revel in its gifts of joy and contentment.

name: The Final Judgement
interpretations: The Final Judgement depicts the Archangel Gabriel playing his trumpet calling all souls from their graves. The souls are judged by the Angel of the Lord. You are being called to consider your life as you have lived it up until now. Contemplate your journey thus far, to seek a connection with the higher purpose, to ponder your beliefs. What path will you choose for the afterlife, and how will you shape it? As the threads of fate twirl, it is never too late to seek a place in the halls of eternity.

name: The World
interpretations: The most all-encompassing card represents the culmination of wisdom and refinement, a testament to the vastness of existence beyond our grasp. For within this realm, countless lives intersect, each with their own stories, aspirations, and revelations. At its core, The World echoes a deeper message - that you are in alignment with your destiny. Your journey thus far has been marked by a wealth of knowledge, empathy, and growth. As you move forward, keep your mind aglow with the flames of curiosity, for the world is a treasure trove of untold wonders, awaiting your discovery.

name: Ace of Wands
interpretations: Lightning strikes a tree bending it, curling its wood, cauterizing the wounds as it strengthens the wood into something more worthy of a wand. Wands are more than wood. They carry intention. and the distilled essence of the wielder's passion. In this moment, know that you stand at the cusp of something extraordinary. Your passion will lead you to create something beautiful and special. The rewards of your labor will be great, and the journey will be spellbinding.

name: King of Wands
interpretations: Wands are the suit of fervor and zeal, and the King of Wands does not disappoint. His presence illuminates the world with an intensity that inspires and empowers all those who come into contact with him. You should be conscious of your passions. Let them inspire you like kindling to your fire and lead you to create a life that you truly love. Be generous with your energy and let the fierce lion of your inner flame guide you on your journey.

name: Queen of Wands
interpretations: This creative queen reigns supreme over her kingdom, safeguarding the flames of her fervor. As a champion of the arts, her mind overflows with a boundless cascade of audacious ideas and schemes. She creates a world that is beautiful and inspiring, but is selective about whom she shares it with. Embrace your fire. Break out of the doldrums and create something beautiful in your life. Explore the depths of your heart's desires and kindle your spirit with the warmth of your ardor. And above all, let your light shine bright, inspiring and encouraging those nearest to your heart to do the same.

name: Knight of Wands
interpretations: The Knight of Wands is the very embodiment of the ultimate action hero. The time for contemplation has passed, and the moment to seize victory is now. There is no time to think; no time to wait; no time better to strike than right this very instant. Passion, urgency, motivation is primed, and the Knight of Wands is a force to be reckoned with. Do The Thing! Start turning the dream into reality. Summon your courage and fight for what you believe in, for the time to act is now.

name: Page of Wands
interpretations: A valiant soul sets forth on a grand expedition. Brimming with audacious ideas, this adventurer plunges into the unknown, daring to seize his heart's desires. The siren call of exploration, thrill, and ingenuity echoes through his being, fueling his journey. Remember, it's not the destination that matters, but the thrill of the ride. Even if the winds of fate steer you astray, you possess the ingenuity to chart a new course. Adventure and excitement are everything!

name: 10 of Wands
interpretations: A figure is burdened by a bundle of wands, each one a weight to carry. They are unwieldy and cumbersome, a reminder of unfulfilled potential. Each wand represents an untapped well of inspiration, a spark waiting to ignite into a blaze of creation. It is in the act of playfully experimenting with these sparks that you discover the alchemy of creation. Failure may arise, but in the ashes of each attempt, new seeds of genius can sprout. Take the time to nurture your dreams and ideas. They hold the key to your happiness and liberation. Be bold and allow the magic within to flourish.

name: 9 of Wands
interpretations: A warrior stands, weary and resolute, with weapons and allies at the ready. They must continue the fight. The battle is almost won. This is a card of Fortitude and Strength. You have fought to protect your loved ones for months, but you still have no security or peace. You have tried to create something a thousand ways, but it's just not right... yet. Do not falter, dear one. Your unwavering spirit and courage will see you through this trial. Persist in your endeavors, continue to fight for what you believe in, for Victory is near!

name: 8 of Wands
interpretations: Arrows pierce through the skies with fierce determination aligned in one direction. The battle has begun. The Universe is in motion, and the wheels of fate have already been set in motion. Though the fruits of your labor may not yet be tangible, trust the journey, for everything is happening at this very moment. Whether you've just begun or been toiling away for long, your efforts are not in vain. Keep the faith, for what goes up must come down. The universe shall reward you in due time.

name: 7 of Wands
interpretations: The 7 of Wands reveals a magical woman, teaching a group of young students with exquisite finesse. Her fantastical wizardry is the fruit of tireless dedication and hours spent mastering the craft of manifestation. She leads the battle of her students, guiding them towards the mastery she has attained. This is the card of The Teacher. Use your experience and wisdom to teach others you see fighting the battles you have already mastered. For teaching is a vocation of great import, one that can shape the very fabric of the world.

name: 6 of Wands
interpretations: The Six of Wands tarot card paints a wondrous scene of a passionate explorer, holding a rugged mystical wooden staff charged with lightning. set against a wild and untamed landscape that embodies adventure, survival, and the magic of discovery. Mystical creatures cheer their hard-fought survival and triumph. Rejoice in each step forward, no matter how small. You may not have won the war yet, but you still deserve recognition. Celebrate your progress. Acknowledge your victories.

name: 5 of Wands
interpretations: There is a chaotic conflict here. The fight seems around them and within their ranks. Arguing, competing, sabotaging, and disarray. Very little progress seems to be happening, but their enemies are not external. Their problems are the chaos and their lack of unity. Be aware of people you trust working against you. Be aware of the self-sabotage that comes from lack of focus. Pull yourself or selves together and work as one with intention and determination. And for Goodness' sake, stop shooting lightning at your own team.

name: 4 of Wands
interpretations: Four wands entwine, signaling a union of great significance, a promise of delightful times ahead. With the castle behind them, only happy thoughts and hopes of a beautiful celebration of life sing out. Be ready for a beautiful celebration in your life. This energy is about family, friends and love. Good things are definitely in store for you. Look for the Good. Celebrate Love. Celebrate Friendship. Be Thankful and be Happy.

name: 3 of Wands
interpretations: A voyager stands at the shore, bearing witness to a fleet laden with the cargo of his successes. His ambition has set many sails afloat, now returning to him with treasures untold. He has lived a productive life. He has put many things in motion out to sea. Now he is realizing his fortune. Trust in the fruits of your labor, for the seeds you sow will blossom with abundance. Believe that you will realize all that you hope to achieve. The ships of your dreams will soon be within reach, and the bounty of your efforts will be yours to behold.

name: 2 of Wands
interpretations: With eyes that see beyond the veil of reality, they behold all that is and all that is yet to be. In their mind's eye lies the blueprint for a life of their design, a tapestry woven with dreams and aspirations. They can see everything in the world, and everything in their environment. They are making their plans with everything happening in their mind. Now is the time to weave your own destiny, to craft the blueprint for your aspirations. In your mind's eye, you possess the power to conjure the future you desire. Plan the grand design of your life's tapestry audaciously.

name: Ace of Cups
interpretations: Water bubbles up over the top of the chalice fountain pouring down the sides into a pool that flows out and beyond the garden. Life itself is completely dependent upon the pure water from this Ace of Cups. You are at the beginning of positive emotional bonds and communication. The bonds of your heart and mind intertwine, and a wellspring of emotion pours forth, imbuing your very being with creative power and the ability to connect deeply with others. You are received and understood, and your relationships will blossom.

name: King of Cups
interpretations: Cups are the suit of emotions, creativity, and communication. The King of Cups dominates his external world standing under the full moon and stars. He dominates from the depths of the ocean up to the ships and the cosmos the same way he commands emotional balance throughout his kingdom. He is connected through the very drops of water in the atmosphere to the deepest ocean currents. No matter what you are facing in life, you can handle it with emotional balance. You can face the depths of darkness with the same determination and confidence you summon in sunlight above the clouds. You will not be shaken. You are even-tempered and empathetic.

name: Queen of Cups
interpretations: The Queen of Cups walks the beach at night filling golden cups with the light and energy of the full moon. Ocean spray curls her wild hair, and the moon shines on her pearls, coral, and seashells. She feels the truth and knows it before you tell her. She uncovers secrets like sand blown from her delicate hands. She understands, and she encourages you to focus on your intuition. Be honest with yourself. Listen to that little voice in your heart and trust yourself. Understanding yourself on an emotional level will make you more in tune with the emotional needs of those you love.

name: Knight of Cups
interpretations: The Knight of Cups is emotional balance in motion. She and her horse are one fighting the power of the turbulent waves crashing on the shore and the tremendous pull of the currents below. She carries the same waters in her cup. She is mastering them. The Knight of Cups matches the level of energy around her, reduces it to peace within her, and then progresses toward her destiny. Find the Beauty. Find the Peace. Find the Truth. Everything will fall into place as you process your world with intentional, active emotional balance.

name: Page of Cups
interpretations: The Page of Cups stands at the edge of the sea considering a fish within his hands. He is just beginning to figure out this little emotional enigma. Each tiny piece of cosmic revelation is a priceless gift. The Page of Cups has a new insight into his own emotions. This will give him new insights into why others feel and behave the way they do. Take time to look inside. Often what bothers you about other people resembles what bothers you about you. Fish by fish, you will grow.

name: 10 of Cups
interpretations: A family sits in front of their home basking in the glow of a rainbow’s promise. This ultimate happy family card whispers of purest joy, where each soul finds solace, support, and love. The scales of fate are balanced, and stability reigns supreme. You are on the right path, where complete happiness awaits, not just for you but for your loved ones too. You are creating a life, a family, a world wherein everyone feels secure, happy, and loved. Trust that you are on the right track of complete happiness for you and your family.

name: 9 of Cups
interpretations: Behold the beacon of positivity shining bright. This is the card of bountiful blessings, where the universe unfurls a feast in your honor. The host, a benevolent presence, beams with joy as you are ushered to a table groaning under the weight of delicious food and overflowing drinks. You are the cherished guest, the honored one, in a celebration of abundance and prosperity. Let your heart swell with gratitude, for you are surrounded by success and fulfillment. And as you step forward into the future, carry this spirit of celebration with you, cherishing your loved ones at every turn. Perhaps be their host and celebrate them lavishly.

name: 8 of Cups
interpretations: The 8 of Cups have spilled out. She is walking away from the mess toward an unknown life. There is nothing left to stay for. It is time to walk away. You have done all that you can. You have tried to fill everyone’s cups and their hearts, but it is of no use. There is nothing left to stay for here. You will never be happy here. A new life in a new direction is just what you need. You do not even need a plan at this point. Just step into the unknown knowing only that it is a new life.

name: 7 of Cups
interpretations: Before you lie gleaming coins, promising wealth and abundance. Then comes the castle, a hearth for home and family, beckoning with its warmth. A feline companion purrs, offering a bond with the creatures of the wild. A serpent slithers, whispering in your ear of the arcane arts and the magic of the universe. The grapevines entwine, promising the rustic pleasures of farm life. Books beckon, igniting the fires of knowledge and the intellect. And finally, the flames roar, fueling the imagination and kindling creativity. The wise traveler is one who knows their heart's desires and chooses wisely. The alchemy of happiness is forged by selecting the right elements along the way.

name: 6 of Cups
interpretations: The 6 of Cups depicts siblings reminiscing about the past. There is a sacred remembering when it is done amongst siblings about their childhood. There is a secret language in the nostalgia that no one else speaks. Take time to remember your childhood. Use the experiences and relationships you remember to help you process your world now. Try not to change the innocent naïveté with reasoning you now have. Keep it simple. Move forward a little less jaded and a little more connected to your innocent past.

name: 5 of Cups
interpretations: The farmer is sad and frustrated about the three cracked and spilled jugs of milk, but glad he still has two full jugs. He walks away focused on what is left. It is time to leave your empty vessels behind and focus on the two full vessels in your hands. The past is over and done. Maybe you have regrets. Maybe you could have handled things differently. It does not matter. It is time to let go of what is done and move forward focused on the possibilities in your life that remain.

name: 4 of Cups
interpretations: He is in deep contemplation focused away from the magical, brilliant light. Introspection, apathy, and the potential for overlooking new opportunities are set in motion for he is unaware of the obvious possibilities all around him. He is not happy. You have choices in front of you, but you are not focused on anything around you. You are being offered something valuable. Engage and be aware of your surroundings. Do not be so absorbed inside your head that you miss out on actual good things. The universe is amazing, pay attention.

name: 3 of Cups
interpretations: Three women are laughing together. toasting their drinks and celebrating each other. They are friends. There is a bond here that makes them even happier than if they were celebrating alone. That bond - that giddiness - is the energy of the 3 of Cups. Now is a time to celebrate with your friends. They will be happy for you and may even have good news of their own. This bond between you is the main focus. Be sure to acknowledge and celebrate your bond. If you do not have friends, now is a good time to open up and make a start. It's okay to trust.

name: 2 of Cups
interpretations: The 2 of cups depicts partners or even lovers working together, loving each other, and genuinely enjoying each other's company. Whatever you are going through, it will be better with a partner. It is time to celebrate your partnerships. Make sure your partners know you appreciate them... even maybe love them. If you do not have a partner, it is okay to think about it, and plan it and pursue it. Life is richer when you have someone to share it with.

name: Ace of Swords
interpretations: Lightning strikes through night sky like a solid beam of blue light over the massive double-edged sword. One edge of the sword is intellect and knowledge. The other edge of the sword is violence and destruction. The lightning sharpens both edges of the Ace of Swords making it all the more powerful and dangerous. You are in a powerful position wielding knowledge and the violence that goes with that superior Intellect unchecked by emotion or empathy. You will definitely emerge victorious. Try as best you can to do no harm.

name: King of Swords
interpretations: The King of Swords is in complete control of his world. He is the smartest man in the room. He is the wisest of all kings. He is a king without emotion, and he can be a nightmare to his enemies. His swords are double edged with intelligence and violence. Do not mistake his calm for weakness. You are being called to control your temper and emotions. Rely on your intellect and logic to control a situation. Advise others wisely and maintain order in your realm. This is not a time for theatrics. This is a time for logic and wit. Outsmart the foxes.

name: Queen of Swords
interpretations: The Queen of Swords has no use for drama. She is in complete control of her own emotions because she ignores them altogether. She thrives on facts and logic. She is brutal. She loses no sleep over destroying enemies. She is completely objective. You are either being warned about a Queen of Swords headed your way. In which case, you must get your facts straight and do not cry. Or you are being called to behave as the Queen of Swords without emotion and deal with a situation completely objectively. Cry later.

name: Knight of Swords
interpretations: The Knight of Swords is brutally direct, completely focused, and obsessed with accomplishing the mission. They are smarter than any other knights and will destroy anyone or anything that gets in their way. They are a shape-shifting terminator. If the Knight of Swords is headed your way, you should find out what they expect from you. Provide it and get out of their way. If you are being called to act as the Knight of Swords in a situation. Get it done. Get out.

name: Page of Swords
interpretations: The Page of Swords is extremely smart and brutally focused on her goals. She is not interested in an engagement ring when there is a chance to join in a good battle. The ego associated with Swords should not be underestimated. You must pay close attention to the details of any project you are starting or action you are beginning to take. This is not a time to consider how anything makes you feel. Focus on working wiser and strive for excellence. Victory is key.

name: 10 of Swords
interpretations: The 10 of Swords is not for the fainthearted. The 10 of Swords depicts someone betrayed and killed with 10 swords sticking out of their back. This is the ultimate failure - utter betrayal. This is your lowest point. It cannot get any worse. It can only get better from here. Leave the failure on the field. Trust no one. Just leave. Start over. Do better. Be wiser.

name: 9 of Swords
interpretations: The 9 of Swords depicts someone suffering from headaches, insomnia, and stress. Their mind is so overwhelmed, they cannot relax. Their mind is wounded, and they have no peace. Take time for yourself. Get some much-needed rest. Stay away from stressful situations. Stay away from toxic people who gaslight you. Seek help. Reach out to people who can help you. Accept help. Create or find a space wherein you can heal.

name: 8 of Swords
interpretations: The Eight of Swords depicts a woman standing amidst eight swords sticking out of the ground. It is almost as though she is trapped there, or a prisoner, but all she must do is take off her blindfold and walk away. She is only trapped by her own indecision and inaction. Don't allow yourself to become trapped within your own thoughts, or the opinions of others. Walk away. Get out of your head. Get them out of your head. Start over. Start simply. Set a goal for yourself and go get it.

name: 7 of Swords
interpretations: The Seven of Swords depicts a person stealing seven swords from an enemy camp. As he is making his getaway, the enemy camp begins to wake and realize they have been robbed. This soldier is very competent, and he has served his own camp well with his strategy, sneakiness, and stealth. Sometimes you have to do sketchy stuff to protect the people you care about. Sometimes wisdom looks a lot like cheating, but all is fair in war. The main goal is to protect your loved ones.

name: 6 of Swords
interpretations: The Six of Swords depicts a person being rescued on a boat with 6 swords. They have experienced something difficult, but now they are going to safety. You have been through some difficult situations. Your life is about to get easier. Keep the wisdom of your experiences with you. You will be wiser for all you've been through. Travel may be in your immediate future. Don't be afraid. It all gets better from here.

name: 5 of Swords
interpretations: The Five of Swords depicts a battle wherein one opponent is far more skilled and competent. He is bigger, and he has more weapons. His enemies are running away from him. They have accepted that they cannot win this battle. Humility is an important virtue. Have the wisdom to know when you are outmatched. Have the humility to retreat. Live to fight another day. Choose your battles. Choose life.

name: 4 of Swords
interpretations: A soldier rests with his 4 swords. He is exhausted, and he needs to recuperate physically. Sleep is his best course of action. In sleep, he will be restored. You need to rest. There is no shame in taking time off. There is no shame in sleeping. Your body needs to recuperate. Rest. Rejuvenate. Relax. You cannot afford not to rest. You need to be at your best for what is to come. Rest.

name: 3 of Swords
interpretations: A heart is pierced by 3 swords on a dark and cloudy, rainy day. You are facing painful revelations. The truth can be a very painful thing. You must process the pain and accept the truths. The suffering will bring you clarity. The suffering - like the rain - will end. The clarity will stay with you forever. You will be wiser for this experience. Your heart will heal.

name: 2 of Swords
interpretations: She holds two swords in her hands with lightning flashing behind her back. She appears ready to move into the fray except for one thing. She must open her eyes. Her swords are her truths. The lightning is her intuition screaming at her. But her eyes are closed. Something is not right about her truths. You must face the possibility that what you have always believed is not true. Listen to your inner voice screaming at you. Open your eyes.

name: Ace of Pentacles
interpretations: A golden coin shines suspended mid-air in a lush green garden. Pentacles are coins representing earth, earthly needs, and luxuries. This is the beginning of a successful venture. You have everything you need. Plant a forest. Build a homestead. Start a business. Whatever your heart is yearning to put your hands to... Do it. Abundance and Prosperity are within your grasp.

name: King of Pentacles
interpretations: He sits upon a golden garden throne. The King of Pentacles is prosperous and kind. Despite his massive fortune, he is down to earth. He is a grounded soul. The King of Pentacles dominates his external world of riches and nature, but he loves his family the most. Focus your energy into the physical world. Take good care of your family. Be present to your loved ones. Use your wealth and prosperity to provide for those you love.

name: Queen of Pentacles
interpretations: She sits upon her golden throne in a garden lush with vivacious green beauty. She is earth mother. The barnyard creatures trust her and follow her. She is generous and kind. While money is no worry for the Queen of Pentacles, she is focused on her family. You are being called to focus on the natural world around you, your family, and your finances. Embrace simplicity and common sense. Snuggle your pets and love your children.

name: Knight of Pentacles
interpretations: He charges forward on a black plow horse through a field of grain. He is massive and strong. The Knight of Pentacles is roughly the sie of a mountain riding a work horse that could cast a shadow on a wooly mammoth. Money is not his concern. His focus is on strength, consistency, and routine successes. Focus on your routines and everyday tasks. Keep your family healthy, happy and safe. This is not a time for extravagance or exotic whims. This is a time to take care of the basics.

name: Page of Pentacles
interpretations: She studies the stars of the sky and the stones on the ground. She is just beginning to see the connections of life on earth from plants and animals to planets and stars to bacteria and fungi to humanity. She watches and learns from the natural world. Her earthiness grounds her along the way. You are beginning to understand how sacred the earth, the plants, the animals, and the people are. You are stepping outside of yourself enough to supply their needs. You must feed the world around you. Start somewhere.

name: 10 of Pentacles
interpretations: Through the massive golden archway lies a castle and a village with gardens, stables, markets, and schools. Everything a family needs to thrive and grow is here. You have or will soon reach a place where all of your family's earthly needs are met. Here there are no worries about money, food, or physical needs. Spend time with your family now. Enjoy your family now. Be present to them. Listen to them. Create the memories now that you will cherish forever.

name: 9 of Pentacles
interpretations: She is elegant and sophisticated. She has raised her family, and now lavishes in beautiful gowns. She goes to elite parties and to all of the upper-class establishments in the area. She has the security of wealth and all of the freedoms and independence that can bring. You are or will soon be financially secure. You have reached a place of refinement and respectability. Enjoy your life. You have worked hard to get here. You deserve this. Help others when you can.

name: 8 of Pentacles
interpretations: He works meticulously everyday to craft the perfect coins for his customers. His handiwork is precise. He is hyper-focused on the details. He can only sell it if it is perfect. Pay attention to the details of your work, but do not become obsessed. There is a fine line between striving for excellence and demanding perfection from yourself. The latter is not healthy. Opportunity looks a lot like hard work, but good opportunities can be missed if you never leave the furnace.

name: 7 of Pentacles
interpretations: She plants golden coins so that the plants that grow will flower with golden coins, and she will become wealthy. Investment is a process of hard work, sacrifice, and faith. Everything you plant and nurture grows and multiplies. Be conscious of what you plant. Plant your light and see how much your light multiplies throughout your world into Love. There is no greater profit than love.

name: 6 of Pentacles
interpretations: The generous woman shares golden coins with the less fortunate homeless man. While he is extremely thankful and happy, her heart is full of joy. The generosity, reciprocity, and the balance between material wealth and spiritual fulfillment, reminds us of the profound impact acts of kindness can have on both the giver and the receiver. You may receive an unexpected gift of charity. Good things can happen unexpectedly. There does not even have to be a reason. Charity is given, but the blessing goes to the giver. Give others your charity and receive an even bigger blessing. Be a Giver.

name: 5 of Pentacles
interpretations: Disabled, unfortunate people stand outside the elegant, stained-glass window of a church. They are not welcomed inside. They stand freezing in the snow and ice. Their only warmth is their bond as outcasts. You are having a hard time. You are struggling with your health, finances, and relationships. You may even be losing faith - in others - and in yourself as well. Hang in there. This, too, shall pass. Reach out to others and accept the help they offer.

name: 4 of Pentacles
interpretations: This man is all about the money. He has issues with security, control, and resistance to change. It is possible to be too focused on money. Greed is not a positive trait in a person. Get out and see the world. Have some adventures. Meet some new people. Maybe even help some people. Spend your money and your time wisely. If you are going to save money, put it in a bank, or invest in other people.

name: 3 of Pentacles
interpretations: Three individuals collaboratively working on a cathedral, each contributing their unique skills to the project, embodying teamwork, skill, and achievement within a setting of concentrated effort and pride. The community leaders have worked together to serve their neighbors, friends, and families. Working together with others to build up and serve a community benefits everyone involved. Participate in your community. The reward is a sleeping well at night because you worked hard helping others.

name: 2 of Pentacles
interpretations: The essence of balance and adaptability is embodied in this person skillfully juggling two golden pentacles against the backdrop of a dynamically moving sea, symbolizing the fluctuation of life's challenges, circumstances, opportunities. You cannot exist within your comfort zone. You must act and react; give and take; fight and make peace; learn and teach. You must push and pull; sparkle and shine; manifest and annihilate. You must ebb and flow with the currents and waves of the multiple responsibilities of life. Juggle like your life depends on it because it makes all the difference.
